title: Installation issue: llvm-amdgpu
body:
I'm seeing the same problem as issue #3668 when using the llvm-amdgpu compiler built from a fresh spack install.  The package builds, but all programs built from it fail to link with:

```
spack/opt/spack/cray-rhel8-zen/gcc-9.2.0/llvm-amdgpu-3.9.0-zhgexziy6khhueovzukh6uwirldttp6n/bin/clang -o tmp tmp.c
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find crtbegin.o: No such file or directory
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lgcc
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lgcc_s
clang-12: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
```

I suspect I'm configuring one or the other of the compilers incorrectly, since the error indicates some path on the system isn't found.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```
git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/spack/spack.git
source spack/share/spack/setup-env.sh
spack compiler add
vi ~/.spack/cray/compilers.yaml # change cc to gcc, etc. inside gcc@9.2.0
spack install llvm-amdgpu@3.9.0%gcc@9.2.0
# compile a simple "int main() {}" program as above.
```

### Information on your system

```
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.15.4
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** cray-rhel8-zen
$ module list
Currently Loaded Modulefiles:
 1) craype-x86-naples   2) craype-network-infiniband   3) shared   4) slurm/slurm/19.05.7  
```

```
# ~/.spack/cray/compilers.yaml 
- compiler:
    spec: gcc@9.2.0
    paths:
      cc: gcc
      cxx: g++
      f77: gfortran
      fc: gfortran
    flags: {}
    operating_system: rhel8
    target: any
    modules:
    - PrgEnv-gnu
    - gcc/9.2.0
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
```

### Additional information

* `$ grep ^SPACK spack-build-env.txt`
```
SPACK_CC=gcc; export SPACK_CC
SPACK_CC_RPATH_ARG=-Wl,-rpath,; export SPACK_CC_RPATH_ARG
SPACK_COMPILER_IMPLICIT_RPATHS=/cm/local/apps/gcc/9.2.0/lib/gcc/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/9.2.0:/cm/local/apps/gcc/9.2.0/lib64:/cm/local/apps/gcc/9.2.0/lib; export SPACK_COMPILER_IMPLICIT_RPATHS
SPACK_COMPILER_SPEC=gcc@9.2.0; export SPACK_COMPILER_SPEC
SPACK_CXX=g++; export SPACK_CXX
SPACK_CXX_RPATH_ARG=-Wl,-rpath,; export SPACK_CXX_RPATH_ARG
SPACK_DEBUG_LOG_DIR=/tmp/coe62691/spack-stage/spack-stage-llvm-amdgpu-3.9.0-2ss2rk4giknrzdyjbluyo6gkihj6fcz6/spack-src; export SPACK_DEBUG_LOG_DIR
SPACK_DEBUG_LOG_ID=llvm-amdgpu-zhgexzi; export SPACK_DEBUG_LOG_ID
SPACK_DTAGS_TO_ADD=--disable-new-dtags; export SPACK_DTAGS_TO_ADD
SPACK_DTAGS_TO_STRIP=--enable-new-dtags; export SPACK_DTAGS_TO_STRIP
SPACK_ENV_PATH=/home/users/coe62691/spack/lib/spack/env:/home/users/coe62691/spack/lib/spack/env/case-insensitive:/home/users/coe62691/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc; export SPACK_ENV_PATH
SPACK_F77=gfortran; export SPACK_F77
SPACK_F77_RPATH_ARG=-Wl,-rpath,; export SPACK_F77_RPATH_ARG
SPACK_FC=gfortran; export SPACK_FC
```
